channel.title: Weekly tor cron fails
channel.description:
Hello,
since the last upgrade of anon-gw-anonymizer-config the weekly tor cron fails. Maybe it was the same before. Just recognized it now.
[code] anon-gw-anonymizer-config: Installed: 3:0.4-1 Candidate: 3:0.4-1 Version table: *** 3:0.4-1 0 500 http://sourceforge.net/projects/whonixdevelopermetafiles/files/internal/ wheezy/main i386 Packages 100 /var/lib/dpkg/status
/etc/cron.weekly/tor: 75: /etc/default/tor: source: not found
diff /etc/default/tor.anondist /etc/default/tor.anondist-orig 72,77d71 < < # Begin of modifications for Anonymity Distributions. < < source /usr/lib/anon-shared-helper-scripts/torsocks-remove-ld-preload < < # End of modifications for Anonymity Distributions.
-rwxr-xr-x 1 root root 670 Aug 15 2013 /usr/lib/anon-shared-helper-scripts/torsocks-remove-ld-preload [/code]

item.title: Weekly tor cron fails
item.dc:creator: ir1s
item.description:
Glad if i can help.

Thanks for the fix.

Read full topic

item.title: Weekly tor cron fails
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
It was most likely before as well. Thanks for noticing!

Will be fixed in Whonix 10 and above.

Commits:

  • https://github.com/Whonix/anon-gw-anonymizer-config/commit/47b7f62e373df93d35b195a8c1983cd88dd33a83
  • https://github.com/Whonix/anon-shared-helper-scripts/commit/54b301673f6aea839b3f0f06c7aeac89d6ed49e6

(You could manually add these fixes if this is important to you, but I guess this is too minor.)

Read full topic

item.title: Weekly tor cron fails
item.dc:creator: ir1s
item.description:
Hello,

since the last upgrade of anon-gw-anonymizer-config the weekly tor cron fails. Maybe it was the same before. Just recognized it now.

anon-gw-anonymizer-config:
  Installed: 3:0.4-1
  Candidate: 3:0.4-1
  Version table:
 *** 3:0.4-1 0
        500 http://sourceforge.net/projects/whonixdevelopermetafiles/files/internal/ wheezy/main i386 Packages
        100 /var/lib/dpkg/status


/etc/cron.weekly/tor: 75: /etc/default/tor: source: not found

diff /etc/default/tor.anondist /etc/default/tor.anondist-orig 
72,77d71
< 
< # Begin of modifications for Anonymity Distributions.
< 
< source /usr/lib/anon-shared-helper-scripts/torsocks-remove-ld-preload
< 
< # End of modifications for Anonymity Distributions.

-rwxr-xr-x 1 root root 670 Aug 15  2013 /usr/lib/anon-shared-helper-scripts/torsocks-remove-ld-preload

Read full topic
